alert.note: Alert for Grant; Natchitoches (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 5:52AM CST until January 09 at 6:30AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 630 AM CST. * At 551 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lena, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colfax, Montgomery, Pollock, Dry Prong, Lake Iatt, Chopin, Aloha, Fishville, Williana and Bentley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms can and sometimes doproduce tornadoes with little or no advanced warning. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
